name: Inside The Anthill
description:
Inside The Anthill is an indie retro game. You are a tiny termite who is trying to get back it's grandma's teeth, which were stolen by the evil ants. Dodge and eat to get through the anthill,  so your grandma can chew wood again!

This game has been developed by 3 students from Multimedia Engineering, at University of Alicante: Alba, Javi and Miguel. The development lasted only for 7 weeks, and took part of our career's evaluation. This project has been created with the intention to be played in an Amstrad CPC 464, and its source code's been written in assembler and CPCTelera, with emulators like Winape and RVM.

This project is part of the CPCRetroDev 2021 contest in which they required a reference to “Rainbow Island” from Ocean Software. We included a Rainbow as the exit of every Level in our game making reference to “Rainbow Island”. 

How to run

To run the game...

If you are using an Amstrad CPC 464:

     1. Insert cassette into the Amstrad System

     2. Turn On the system

     3. Type -> Run”

     4. Press the Play button

     5. Type any Key

Otherwise, when using WinApe Emulator:

     1. Run your emulator.

     2. Go to File -> Drive A -> Insert Disk Image...

     3. Select the .cdt file.

     4. Press "Accept".

How to play

In order to play the game...

● Main Character’s actions

    ○ Keys

      ■ “Q” Move Up

      ■ “A” Move Down

      ■ “O” Move Left

      ■ “P” Move Right

      ■ “Space” Bite Box

    ○ Joystick

      ■ “Joystick Up” Move Up

      ■ “Joystick Down” Move Down

      ■ “Joystick Left” Move Left

      ■ “Joystick Right” Move Right

      ■ “Joystick Button” Bite Box

● Menu Keys

    ○ “Esc” Enter Menu

    ○ “Space” Continue
